input_email_body:
Subject: Problems with Syncing Airtable and JIRA

I am encountering sync difficulties with the Airtable and JIRA integrations. It is possible that outdated API connections are the cause. Despite restarting services and verifying credentials, the problem remains unresolved You can reach me at omar.hassan@secure.net.. Your support in addressing this issue would be greatly appreciated My name is Maria Gonzalez.. Please advise if there are any specific details you require from me to diagnose the problem. I look forward to your response.
